GSD.description:
tty: serial: Fix refcount leak bug in ucc_uart.c

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit ca3fc1c38e4253bc019881301a28ea60b8b0bca3. For more details please see the references link.
